Notes

  • 10th of July 2014

    Two years in review It has been more than two years actually since I’ve started working at Spade as a Front-End Developer. To be precise, two years and seven months. Time really does flies by.

  • 25th of November 2013

    New website, hello Jekyll! I finally had some time to work on my website. I made the decision to switch from Wordpress to Jekyll. The main reason is that I wanted to learn something new. I started reading a lot of articles about Jekyll and I thought: “Why not give it a go?”.
